links.*: Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics
Roman Britain and the English Settlements
The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[14 January|14]]''' - In his Preface to ''[[Roman Britain and the English Settlements]]'', R.G. Collingwood on this date writes about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s contribution to the book.
==March==
* '''[[30 March|30]]''' - C.A. Furth (of [[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin Ltd]]) writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
==April==
* '''[[28 April|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes the manuscript "[[Parma Eldalamberon 21|Primitive Quendian: Final Consonants]]".
==May==
* '''[[17 May|17]]''' - Swedish author [[Lars Gustafsson]], who were to conduct an [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien|interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
==June==
* '''[[14 June|14]]''' - Author [[G.K. Chesterton]] dies.
==August==
* '''[[10 August|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 8b]].
==September==
* '''[[4 September|4]]''' - German translator [[Hans J. Schütz]] is born.
* '''[[27 September|27]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Aurelius Pompen|a letter to Professor A. Pompen]].
==October==
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] finishes retyping ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - [[Stanley Unwin]] reads the typescript of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
* '''[[17 October|17]]''' - [[David Buck]], who would voice [[Gimli]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]], is born.
* '''[[21 October|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 8c]].
* '''[[30 October|30]]''' - [[Rayner Unwin]], aged 10, writes a "[[Report on the Hobbit]]".
==November==
* '''[[25 November|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] delivers the lecture "[[Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics]]" to the British Academy.
==December==
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - [[Marian Diamond]], who would voice [[Galadriel]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], is born.
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.

==?==
* '''?''' - [[Allen and Unwin]] read the manuscript of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and suggest that he complete it.
* '''?''' - ''[[Songs for the Philologists]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - Illustrator [[Peter Chuklev]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s secretary [[Joy Hill]] is born.
{{Years|1933|1934|1935|1936|1937|1938|1939|}}
